edge_1: Ken Watanabe plays the character Drift, who is a Samurai-motif Autobot, tactician, and a former Decepticon assassin.
edge_2: Drift transforms into a black and blue 2014 Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse.

edge_2: Drift also transforms into a Sikorsky S-97 Raider Helicopter.
